meanings.definition: A visual representation or image produced by painting, drawing, photography, etc.
meanings.sent1: I hung a picture of my family on the wall.
meanings.sent2: She took a picture of the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: I tried to draw a picture of a cat, but it ended up looking like a potato with whiskers.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a picture of a peaceful meadow in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The picture of the rainbow was so vivid, it felt like I could touch it.

meanings.sent1: The scary movie painted a picture of monsters in my mind.
meanings.sent2: His description of the beach created a beautiful picture in my head.
meanings.sent3: I tried to picture a flying elephant, but my brain said, 'No way!'
meanings.sent4: The memory of her laughter painted a picture of joy in my heart.
meanings.sent5: The picture of the haunted house was so real, I could almost hear the creaking doors.

meanings.definition: To represent or depict in a visual form.
meanings.sent1: She will picture the scene in her next painting.
meanings.sent2: He pictures himself as a famous actor in the future.
meanings.sent3: I tried to picture my dog wearing sunglasses, and it made me giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a picture of a magical world in my imagination.
meanings.sent5: The artist pictured a serene landscape with vibrant colors in her mind before starting to paint.
